name: 戴维·邦芬

last_movies.title: 夜魔侠：重生 第一季

introduction: David Bonfim is Brazilian living in New York for 35 years. He speaks English, Portuguese and Spanish (with Light Brazilian accent). He has BA in Theatre from City College of New York, and was cast in many plays, short films, and feature films. A one act play Invitation to a Funeral for City College 2012 one act festival was his first play that he directed. He likes to sing and play acoustic guitar. He is also a painter. He paints in acrylic and draws with graphite and charcoal from life drawing classes. He knows some karate and swim.
